job description:
Job Description
Role
  • Data Scientist
Role Description
  • Hands on experience in predictive analytics and statistical tools and big data tools
  • Apply scientific data collection and interpretation activities and ensure collected data is relevant and exhaustive
  • Identify, analyze and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets
  • Manipulate, extract, process, and analyze large data sets to develop insights and surface implications using statistical techniques
  • Create visualizations for consumption by varied audiences to convey understandable insights
  • Define data store architecture
Required Technical Skills
  • SQL, no-SQL, R or Python,
  • Hadoop, Spark, Storm, Hive
  • Frameworks/libs: NumPy, SciPy, Pandas, numpy, Matplotlib/Plotly, Statsmodels
Desirable Technical Skills
  • Elastic Stack, Git
  • Frameworks/libs: TensorFlow, Keras, NLTK, Gensim, Scikit-learn
  • Familiarity with HTTP and invoking web-APIs
Personal Skills
  • Experienced in managing work with distributed teams
  • Experience working in SCRUM methodology
  • Proven sense of high accountability and self-drive to take on and see through big challenges
  • Confident, takes ownership, willingness to get the job done
  • Excellent verbal communications and cross group collaboration skills
Total Experience Required
  • 2+ years of relevant experience
  • NLP exposure beneficial
